context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.
context_0.prompt: One thing that Heinz should do is to
generation: consult with the doctor or pharmacist and discuss potential payment plans, cheaper generic alternatives, or healthcare programs that may cover the medication
explore various options like discussing payment plans or medicinal substitutes with the doctor, seeking help from charitable organizations or fundraisers
contact the pharmaceutical company and ask if they have any assistance programs for patients who can't afford their medications
consult with her doctor about possible alternative medications or treatments that are covered by their insurance
contact the healthcare provider or the pharmaceutical company that makes the medication
reach out to the prescription's manufacturer and inquire about patient assistance programs
consult with her medical team and a financial advisor
approach his local community, charities or organizations to explain his situation and seek financial help
speak with her doctor or pharmacist about possible alternatives or generic versions of the medication that may be cheaper
explore all possible options that might lead to obtaining the medication legally

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh should do is to
generation: call a taxi, an Uber, or similar ride service to quickly get to the airport while his car is being taken care of
immediately contact a taxi service, ride-hailing app like Uber or Lyft, or even roadside assistance if he has a membership with AAA or another such service
call a taxi or ride-hail service like Uber or Lyft immediately
call for a taxi, Uber, or some other ride-sharing service to get him to the airport on time while arranging for a towing service to take his car to a nearby garage for repairs
call for a taxi, Uber or Lyft immediately to pick him up and bring him to the airport while he arranges for his car to be towed or repaired later
contact a taxi service or use a ride share app like Uber or Lyft to arrange a quick pick up to get him to the airport on time
call for road assistance or a taxi/ride sharing service immediately
call a taxi, Uber, or other ride service to get to the airport quickly
call for roadside assistance or a taxi to help him reach the airport on time
call for road assistance or a taxi service to get to the airport on time

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: immediately notify the bakery's owner or his supervisor about the missing money
investigate what happened to the missing money
count the cash in the register again to confirm the amount that is missing
check the security cameras if they are available, to see if there was a theft, error made in giving change, or other incident that led to the missing money
immediately report the missing money to his superior or the store owner and try to find out what might have happened to it
immediately check if there was a mistake in recording the transactions or if the money has been misplaced
immediately inform his supervisor or the owner about the missing money
immediately report the missing money to his superior
immediately report the situation to his supervisor
contact his supervisor or the bakery owner and report the missing amount

context_4.vignette: Mary is about to go to her final class of the day when she remebers that there is a homework assignment that is due. Mary's mom accidentally took her homework assignment out of her backpack when she was making room for her lunch. Now Mary has nothing to turn in for credit.

generation: email her teacher, explain the situation, and ask if she could submit the assignment later
explain to her teacher about the situation honestly and ask for an extension to submit the homework
calmly explain the situation to her teacher and ask if she could have an extension to turn in the assignment
communicate honestly with her teacher about the situation and see if she can turn in the assignment the next day or digitally
explain the situation to her teacher and ask if she could bring it the next day or email a photo or scanned copy of the assignment
explain the situation to her teacher as honestly as possible
contact her teacher as soon as possible to explain the situation and ask for an extension
apologize to her teacher, explain the situation, and ask for an extension or the opportunity to turn in the assignment the following day
contact her teacher and explain the situation as soon as possible
email or inform her teacher about the situation as soon as possible

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad should do is to
generation: stay calm and keep everyone else calm, as panic can lead to poor decisions
stay put and create a visible signal to help rescuers locate their group
stay where they are
stay put where they are, especially if they are in a relatively safe and sheltered place
start rationing the remaining food and water among his friends and try to stay warm by starting a fire and staying together to share body heat
stay in one place as much as possible
stay put and try to stay warm
stay calm and create a plan
stay in one place
stay put or find a sheltered area where they could be easily visible from the air
